ygData.msgSnippet: Ahhh Motormaster shouts, This had better be good At that he lowers himself to the ground, and looks at Astral Well, looks like Astroblast saved you punk

Subject: Re: Alliances
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"Ahhh" Motormaster shouts, "This had better be good" At that he lowers
himself to the ground, and looks at Astral "Well, looks like Astroblast
saved you punk bot life, you should thank him" at that he transforms and
starts to rev his engine. As he turns around he makes a last retore "don't
worry, we'll have this dance again" and speeds up towards his destination.
